Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: I was blown away by the food and the service. The biggest issue I encountered with vegetarian or vegan food is that taste palette, but that isn't the case here. The sushi was amazing. The choice of sushi rolls was amazing. The service was amazing. Without question, would dine here again.

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text:
I come here very often, usually picking up sushi from toogoodtogo.
The sushi is delicious, there's a lot of variety, staff is cool and friendly.. California fried roll is definitely my favorite! :)
Simply said I am very happy that this place exists!

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: The food was delicious, the waiter very kind and attentive and the service quite fast. The location is perfect in front of the tram and the decoration is cute.

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text:
Love the selection of sushi; really enjoyed the 'No chicken teriyaki'. Special shout out for the best sweet potato 'tempura' I've ever had.
Also, the service was wonderful ‚ú®
Will definitely go back soon ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar

I'll be back for more!

Review Text: Straight to the point, the food here is very delicious! Besides serving vegan sushi, this place might as well also be a considered a pastry. They have some unique and again very tasteful desserts. I was even more impressed considering ‚Ä¶

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: When we entered the place, it was a lot smaller than we thought. We were seated at a cozy high table. The service was amiable and explained to us the menu; it comes down to different sushi variants. However, they only use vegan ingredients. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: Amazing sushi with unique flavors. We ordered a few different rolls with a group of 4 and all of them were delicious. Highly recommend for anyone to dine in or pick up!

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: 4 stars(not 5) only because of the price and the interior, very small, more for a quick bite but it could cost you a lot... Food was delicious, sushi very good quality, tasty, different from usual but it's pretty expensive for the experience overall. No alcohol, why not?

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: One of the highlights of eating vegan in Amsterdam. We tried the faux shrimp, crab and truffle maki rolls. Service was excellent. Could be slightly pricey for the portions, but worth the experience in a nice ambience.

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text:
Amazing, dishes were better than no-vegan sushis I already ate before. I'm still confuse and impress of this exp√©rience, the price is justified.
Thank you so much for the lunch

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: Tasty vegan sushi and friendly staff!

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: Excellent services. Friendly staff. Vegan sushi rolls are great. Small store. Good location near other stores. Recommended.

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text:
Best vegan sushis I had so far.
It is a bit expensive, but the food is very good.
It would be amazing if they could have a "trying plate" because it's very difficult to choose and too expensive to try everything.

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: Wow hard to find the right words! The tuna sashimi left me speechless, never had such a good vegan sashimi. The fried shrimp roll was another favourite. The menu size is just perfect with carefully selected options. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: The Vegan Sushi Bar has it all: excellent service, delicious food, very cosy interieur: definitely worth a visit! Best vegan sushi place in Amsterdam :)

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: Got here towards the end of the night and they were happy to seat us, after a table cleared for our party. I got one of each of the signature rolls and was blown away! Tasty, fresh, and absolutely delicious. Limited seating but it‚Äôs nice and intimate. I‚Äôll be coming here every time I‚Äôm in Amsterdam!

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: Yum!! Amazing vegan sushi and welcoming and kind staff. A very enjoyable experience all around.

Review Text: Finally a place in Amsterdam that makes me want to go back! Great vibes, staff and delicious food. Where's my loyalty card? :P

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: They have one of the best vegan sushi I have ever had! Very much recommend as a must visit place in Amsterdam for a lunch break or evening dinner/date. Staff is very friendly and the ambience is very cool but also elegant.

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: The spicy mango is so delicious, and the vegan gyoza. They have many other options which makes this place worth another visit :)

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: Lovely place with lovely staff. The owner is extremely kind and attentive. Good energy, nice atmosphere , hip and modern, and everything is high vibe, the sushi is with black rice and very tasty. Candles, good music, squeeky clean. Try the mushroom sushi set it‚Äôs stellar. 5 stars. Will return üëç

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: I can definitely recommend this restaurant. David and Veronica are lovely people that care for their customers. It was my first time there and eating vegan sushi in general, they explained every dish on the menu. The food is delicious and something you have not tasted before. If you haven't tried this, go for it!

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text:
Good quality sushi, quite pricey for the quantity you get so it would not be my choice too often. Good every once in a while.
The only thing I didn't like is their wasabi paste.

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: Sushi here is great, and don't be afraid that it's vegan, you won't even notice any difference. The "crab" and "salmon" tasted exactly the same as real. Waitress is gorgeous!

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: The two of us shared 3 different Signature Rolls and one Maki Set, which I found to be the perfect amount to share and get a good try of all the variety they offer. We could taste the creativity and the harmony of all the ingredients in the ‚Ä¶

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: The quality of the sushi and the flavour profiles are honestly so delicious. The service is great and the people that run it/work there are kind and friendly. The vibe is chic and cozy which is the cherry on the top. Highly recommend!

Review Text: Amaaaaazing place. Friendly staff. Sushi is delicious

Review Text: Really tasty sushi with great texture and quality ingredients. This is the kind of sushi you miss when eating plant based. The staf are also super friendly and go out of their way to help. I'll be a regular customer for sure.

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: Started with the 'tuna' sashimi and gyoza, both delicious and the two sushi rolls we shared were excellent. Definitely gonna try sweet potato and tofu when we make sushi at home. Would highly recommend.

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: A teeny tiny bit overpriced, but the food is really, really good. Great service, too!

Name: Vegan Sushi Bar
Review Text: Yay vegan sushi! I tried the gyoza, crab sushi and mushroom sushi and they were all delicious. Staff are super friendly, nice decor, good music. Lots of interesting options on the menu so will definitely be back to try more :-)
